actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 United States Code to permit the incarceration in Federal prisons of State prisoners sentenced to a State career criminal or habitual offender statute.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to allow the Attorney General, upon the request of a State, to provide for the confinement of a State prisoner incarcerated pursuant to a State career criminal or habitual offender statute in a Federal penal or correctional institution. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1989 through 1993 to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 United States Code to permit the incarceration in Federal prisons of State prisoners sentenced to a State career criminal or habitual offender statute.
